1: <pb/><t>Ix tac'vi vin̈aj Job chi' icha tic:</t>
2: <t>Tato smasanil in yaelal yed' in cusc'olal tic, tz'echtaj d'a yol junoc echlab',</t>
3: <t>tecan ec'to yalil d'a yichan̈ yarenail sti' a' mar, yuj chi' ix in comon alej icha tic.</t>
4: <t>A Dios Syal Yuj Smasanil, ichato ix och ch'apnaj sjul-lab' d'ayin, axo svenenoal spucax d'a in nivanil. Toxo ix oymaj tas ay smay d'ayin yuuj.</t>
5: <t>¿Tocval tz'oc' noc' caltacte'al b'uru tato ay yan̈ noc'? ¿Tocval tz'oc' noc' mam vacax tato ay tas sc'ux noc'?</t>
6: <t>¿Mach schi'an junoc chib'il vail tato malaj yatz'amil? ¿Tocval vach' sloji saquil noc' n̈olob' tato malaj yatz'amil?</t>
7: <t>Icha chib'il vail malaj yatz'amil, icha chi' tas tzin chi ticnaic svab'i. Man̈xalaj in gana in va'i.</t>
8: <t>Comonoc tz'el d'a sc'ol Dios yac'an tas tzin c'an d'ay. Comonoc syac' tas tzin nib'ej.</t>
9: <t>Comonoc tz'el d'a sc'ol Dios chi' in sataneli, yic tzin lajviel d'a juneln̈ej.</t>
10: <t>Vach'chom svab' syail yuj in yaelal yed' in cusc'olal tic, palta tzin te tzalaji, yujto svac'n̈ej och sley Dios yipoc in c'ool, aton Dios Axon̈ej Ochi.</t>
11: <t>Man̈xalaj vip svab'i yic svac'an techaj in yaelal tic, ¿tasxom yuj comon pitzan into?</t>
12: <t>¿Tocval lajan stzatzil in nivanil tic icha q'uen q'ueen? ¿Tocval icha stzatzil q'uen bronce stzatzil in b'ac'chil?</t>
13: <t>Maxtzac yal in colan in b'a d'a yol vico'. Man̈xa junoc mach scolvaj ved'oc.</t>
14: <t>A junoc mach ayoch d'a syaelal, vach'chom man̈xa yelc'och Dios Syal Yuj Smasanil d'ay, palta smoj val tz'ac'ji snivanil sc'ol yuj eb' svach'c'ool.</t>
15: <t>Palta a ex tic ex vamigo, ton̈ej ix in e vach' juejeli. Lajan ex icha junoc a' eluma' stup d'a smelemal.</t>
16: <t>Ayic syac'an n̈ab' tat tz'aj sat a' sb'eyi calan a' yed' q'uen cheev, ma yed' q'uen sacb'acom.</t>
17: <t>Ayic tz'ulax q'uen cheev chi', stupem a' eluma' chi', axo yic tzovaj c'ac' stacjiem a'.</t>
18: <t>A eb' anima b'eyum, sb'at eb' d'a titac b'e yic sayan a' eb' yuq'uej, axo tz'aji, satcanb'at eb' d'a lum taquin̈ luum chi', ata' schamcan eb'.</t>
19: <t>A eb' b'eyum anima aj chon̈ab' Temán yed' eb' aj Sabá, say a a' eb' yojtactaxon b'aj scani,</t>
20: <t>axo yic sc'och eb' b'aj aytaxon a' chi', taquin̈xo yed'tal a', toxon̈ej staccanq'ue sc'ol eb'.</t>
21: <t>Icha chi' eyaj d'ayin a ex tic, yujto ayic tzeyilanoch jantac in yaelal tic, ton̈ej tzex xivq'uei.</t>
22: <t>Palta a in tic, malaj tas tzin c'an d'ayex. Malaj tumin tzin c'an d'ayex yic tzin colchaji.</t>
23: <t>¿Tocval tzin c'an e colval yic tzin colchaj d'a yol sc'ab' jun ajc'ol d'ayin, ma d'a juntzan̈ eb' elc'um?</t>
24: <t>Aq'uec in c'ayb'ub'al, ol in cha vab' d'ayex. Ch'oxec och in mul chi' d'a in sat.</t>
25: <t>Malaj junoc mach spaticanel junoc pensar to vach', palta a ex tic, man̈xa stzolal tas tzeyac'och d'a vib'an̈.</t>
26: <t>A ex tic nab'an̈ej tzin e tumej, palta eyojtac to a slolonel junoc mach ayoch d'a syaelal, ay b'aj malaj jab'oc yelc'ochi.</t>
27: <t>A ex tic, syal eyac'an e suerte d'a yib'an̈ eb' meb'a' ob'iltac. Syalpax e chon̈anel junoc eyamigo.</t>
28: <t>Ochan̈ec q'uelan d'a in sat, tato ton̈ej svesej.</t>
29: <t>Actejec eyalan juntzan̈ chi' d'a in patic. Comonoc tzeyojtaquejeli to yel juntzan̈ sval tic.</t>
30: <t>A e naani to esalvum in. A e naani to man̈ vojtacoc tas yel yed' tas man̈ yeloc.</t>
